extensionDescription.message: Strelloids - Trello possibilities expander. Custom tags, colored lists, hiding the lists, scrum points, new views and much more.

settings_lists_displayMode_standard.description: Display mode option name in the select

settings_lists_displayMode_multiRows.description: Display mode option name in the select

settings_lists_displayMode_table.description: Display mode option name in the select

module_cardsSeparator_description.message: To make separator, start card title with three or more characters: - or = (eg. "--- My separator"
module_cardsSeparator_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

module_customTags_description.message: To make tag, put their name inside square brackets into card title (eg. "[tag name]")
module_customTags_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

module_scrumTime_description.message: To add estimation points for card, put it into round brackets (eg. "(3)", "(0.5)", "(?)"). To set consumption points, put it into square brackets (eg. "[5]", "[2.5]").
module_scrumTime_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

module_cardsPrioritization_description.message: To set priority for the card, insert into their title one of this keywords: "!1", "!2", "!3", "!4" or "!5", where 1 is the highest priority.
module_cardsPrioritization_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

options_interval_description.message: Interval between next loops. If you change card title and eg. tags appears with to long delay, you can reduce this value. Too small value, can "warm up" your processor.

options_reset.description: Options - The title attribute for reset button

module_coloredLists_resetColoringSchemes.message: Will reset ALL above color schemes to default.

options_enableBoardScroll.message: Overwrite vertical scroll on board with horizontal

options_enableBoardScroll_description.message: If enabled you will be able to scroll board in horizontal without holding shift key (just in default display mode).

options_enableTabKeyInTextarea.message: Allow use Tab key in card description and comments

options_enableTabKeyInTextarea_descripti.message: If enabled you will be able to insert indent inside card description and comment textarea by tab key. Thanks to this, eg. you can easily create nested list.

options_enableMarkdownChecklist.message: Allow use Markdown checklist in card description and comments

options_enableMarkdownChecklist_descript.message: If enabled you will be able to insert checklist in Markdown style inside card description and comment. It can be done by insert at begin of element in standard list "[x]" for checked and "[ ]" for not.

options_enableMarkdownTables.message: Allow use Markdown tables in card description and comments

options_enableMarkdownTables_description.message: If enabled you will be able to create tables in Markdown style inside card description and comment.

options_about_sourceCodeDescription.message: Strelloids is open source software. You can check, verify or even edit this code. It is published on GitHub.

options_about_helpDescription.message: Check the wiki for more help, descriptions and examples.

options_about_issue.message: Found an bug or have an idea?

options_about_issueDescription.message: I'm not Mr. Robot. I'm making a lot of bugs!

options_about_emailDescription.message: If you prefer the old way of contact.

options_about_donateDescription.message: If you enjoying, consider donation for more coffee via PayPal.
